---
title: "Part 1 (ch24) Questions Numeric"
---



::: {style="text-align: right"}
[Go to next Chapter](p2num.qmd){.btn .btn-primary .btn role="button" data-toggle="tool}
:::



::: {.callout-note}
### For students

**Last updated: 31/01/2025  **

**Type your answers with "." instead of ","! For numerical answers, use 2 decimal places. For instance, if your answer is 0.12345 or 12.345%, type, "12.34" in the box.**

:::


___

## Question 1





You founded your own firm two years ago. Initially, you contributed **0.057 million**  of your money and, in return, received **1 million** shares of stock. Since then, you have sold an additional **0.75 million** shares to angel investors. You are now considering raising even more capital from a venture capitalist. The venture capitalist has agreed to invest **3 million**  and receive **2 million** shares. Assuming that this is the venture capitalist’s first investment in your company. 

**What is the post-money valuation, in million? ** <input class='webex-solveme nospaces' data-tol='0.001' size='5' data-answer='["5.625"]'/>

**Assuming that this is the venture capitalist’s first investment in your company, what percentage of the firm will he or she end up owning?**  <input class='webex-solveme nospaces' data-tol='0.001' size='6' data-answer='["53.333"]'/>

**What percentage will you own?**  <input class='webex-solveme nospaces' data-tol='0.001' size='6' data-answer='["26.667"]'/>

**What is the value of your shares, in million?**  <input class='webex-solveme nospaces' data-tol='0.001' size='3' data-answer='["1.5"]'/>









**Answers**:


1) 5.625

2) 53.333

3) 26.667

4) 1.5



___



## Question 2









**Q:** A company has raised capital as follows (in millions USD). 

\item Series A Pre-Money: **1.182** & Series A Post-Money: **2.636**

\item Series B Pre-Money: **41.58** & Series B Post-Money: **64.632**

\item Series C Pre-Money: **134.072** & Series C Post-Money: **202.308**

**How much did the company raised in each round, in millions?**

Round A: <input class='webex-solveme nospaces' data-tol='0.001' size='5' data-answer='["1.454"]'/>, Round B: <input class='webex-solveme nospaces' data-tol='0.001' size='6' data-answer='["23.052"]'/>, Round C: <input class='webex-solveme nospaces' data-tol='0.001' size='6' data-answer='["68.236"]'/>



**Assuming no other securities were issued, what fraction of the firm’s shares were held by common shareholders (founders and employees) after each round, in percent?**

Round A: <input class='webex-solveme nospaces' data-tol='0.001' size='6' data-answer='["44.841"]'/>, Round B: <input class='webex-solveme nospaces' data-tol='0.001' size='6' data-answer='["28.848"]'/> , Round C: <input class='webex-solveme nospaces' data-tol='0.001' size='6' data-answer='["19.118"]'/>













**Answers:**

1) 

Round A: 2.636 -  1.182  = 1.454

Round B: 64.632 -  41.58  = 23.052 

Round C: 202.308 -  134.072  =68.236

2) 

Round A: 1.182 /  2.636  = 44.841

Round B: 41.58 /  64.632 *   1.182 /  2.636 = 28.848 

Round C: 134.072 /  202.308 *   1.182 /  2.636 * 41.58 /  64.632 = 19.118



___
